column4: damn it im still having problems with my 8800GTS  ive installed nvidia-glx and enabled it...i think
are you on feisty the nvidia-glx-new might be what you want are you getting an api mismatch error
maybe boot in to recovery mode and then check /var/log/Xorg.0.log see if its the mismatched api then install nvidia-glx-new also check dmesg and messages for errors
